Reviews.Title: looks like a rock
Reviews.Author: caroln
Reviews.Content: It looks like a rock, feels like a rock ... what more could you ask from a rock key holder?

Reviews.Title: Neat Key Holder
Reviews.Author: Just A Buyer
Reviews.Content: These blend in with some stones I have so work well . I did put the key in a small plastic coin bag to make sure it stayed dry and didn't rust .  I bought several of these and the bottom cover (white) had corners showing on two of them .  Took a file and filed them down so they aren't visible now.  Covered two of them up with other rocks stacked on them since they are well made . If one has a little more white or light color than you like use black Magic Marker to touch them up .  I am well pleased with them .

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: N. Butts "Yeah"
Reviews.Content: This item is useless. It is not the item pictured on Amazon. The item received looks nothing like a real rock. You'd do much better to just stick your extra key in a zip-lock bag and hide it under a real rock.

Reviews.Title: Too small, doesn't protect from water
Reviews.Author: S. Luck
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in this product.  The inside compartment was too small to fit my house key (which is a fairly standard size).  And the key compartment isn't designed in a way to keep water out, so I'm afraid the key would rust.

Reviews.Title: Not realistic at all.
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: The rock shipped to me was not the one pictured.  It looks like an obvious plastic toy. Not even remotely realistic in appearance.  It looks so bad it might actually attract unwanted attention if placed near real rocks or a garden.

Reviews.Title: Too Small
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: This "rock" is too small to hold an ordinary house key.Not worth sending it back - just a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: lcstew
Reviews.Content: This product looked great in the picture, but in real life it looks so fake.  It's unreal how clearly too fake this product is.  We cannot even use it that's how fake it is.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: M. Coleman
Reviews.Content: We have 4 grown children and no one seems to be able to keep track of their key to our house. We feel confident that the extra rock in our flower bed looks innocent and is safer than leaving the key under the door mat.

Reviews.Title: Misleading description, white cheap paint in cracks
Reviews.Author: Nicole Rienzi
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating b/c the rock despite description is misleading. It does not look like in the picture and has what seems to be cheap white paint filling in the cracks making it look extremely fake. Disappointed .

Reviews.Title: Good product for right price
Reviews.Author: SandyKay "animal and nature lover"
Reviews.Content: The price of this key rock is perfect.  The key rock is hard to detect when placed among other rocks or outdoor material.  We've had one for 20 years, and it looks the same as the day we started to use it. This was purchased for a relative who needed to place a key outdoors. No need to spend a lot of money for something so simple and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this
Reviews.Author: cusefan06
Reviews.Content: It looks like a real rock but the white plastic below is too big for the rock.Also, mine broke when I dropped it! So weak!!

Reviews.Title: Tiny and natural
Reviews.Author: Nancy Fortunato
Reviews.Content: This rock is very small and could be easily placed among real rocks.  It will safely hold a key but not several.  I have ordered more than one for different locations around the property. Useful but subtle.

Reviews.Title: Hide A Key
Reviews.Author: izzyv
Reviews.Content: This works for me!  It is in an easy hiding place, among other smaller rocks it really looks real.  It is marked on the flat side.  I am very comfortable with this "rock".

Reviews.Title: "As seen on TV"
Reviews.Author: Cord B.
Reviews.Content: This rock gets the job done.  My wife and I stuffed our stockings this year with "As seen on TV" goodies, and this was one of the gifts.  It's useful, hard to break, and would be the most appreciated gift if gaining entrance to the house is needed.

Reviews.Title: fake!
Reviews.Author: kissy_tinkerbell
Reviews.Content: true story:i had a delayed flight and arrived at a relative's home to find they had left a note, as they briefly left to drop something off down the road. i was about to sit on the porch and wait when i looked at the plants and rocks next to the front door. one rock looked a bit off so out of curiosity i picked it up. it was their hide a key rock, which of course contained their house key. it took me just moments to spot a "hidden" key...and i wasn't really looking! needless to say, my relatives stopped using it.

Reviews.Title: I used a rock
Reviews.Author: Q-Mic Accessories
Reviews.Content: Instead of paying 1 cent for this plus shipping, why not simply use a rock?  With a few tools you can make a hole in no time.  And to be extra safe, put your new key rock in a neighbors yard 3-4 houses away, so if someone happens to find your new key rock, they'll try breaking into your neighbors house (suggest you pick one you don't like much) and your house is safe as ever.Or, don't simply put a key in an old chinese food container and bury it in the dirt... how hard is it to dig out a pound of dirt? Come on.. get real.. and no one's going to find it.. well if they see you digging and putting it there.ok, have fun.. ! And be safe

Reviews.Title: Look fake
Reviews.Author: Chocolate
Reviews.Content: It does not look like a real rock at all.  I am afraid to use it because it's too obvious.

Reviews.Title: Hidden in plain sight
Reviews.Author: R. Klein
Reviews.Content: It's always prudent to keep a key stashed somewhere, but under a flower pot just doesn't seem too well hidden.  I bought this hoping that it would blend into the garden outside.  I use it, nestled among plants, and even when I'm looking for it, it's hard to spot.  It does look natural, and it fits well into the setting.  Right size to hold a key.  Not sure what else I could ask for in terms of a discreet hiding place for a spare key.

Reviews.Author: EAA
Reviews.Content: Another one too risky to try.  Maybe someone else would take the chance, but not something for us.  Just don't want to take the chance.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy
Reviews.Author: Jennie D. Irwin
Reviews.Content: Did not receive rock that is pictured and rock we received is not waterproof. Seller did not hold true to it claim. Rock we received has a plastic bottom under side of rock.

Reviews.Title: Plastic Back
Reviews.Author: Jeani
Reviews.Content: The plastic back on this cheap hide-a-key is rediculous.  Buy a different one if you want it to last even a short time.

Reviews.Title: ok for what it is
Reviews.Author: stacy witt
Reviews.Content: this is an ok purchase, wish the bottom fit a bit better so the key was more secure inside it

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: penny
Reviews.Content: the product was a lot more real lookin and heavier than expected but it gave it a better realistic effect

Reviews.Title: Cheap hiding spot, decent rock facade.
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: The hiding spot is cheaply constructed. If you shake the rock, it will fall open and reveal the key. Also, it has no plastic protector for the key, and very little space, so you have to figure out a method to protect it from rust and the elements. Worth the cheap cost, but barely. Not a very good product.

Reviews.Title: works great.
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I got this because our toddler is learning how to unlock and lock the back door. It is great knowing that I have a spare key hidden in the yard. And it blends in well with the other rocks.

Reviews.Title: key rock
Reviews.Author: Louis Keating
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted.  Now I am looking for rocks to match it so it does not stand out from the others.

Reviews.Title: HANDY!!!
Reviews.Author: kathy1
Reviews.Content: How handy! I love this product. I am able to hide my house key and no one has an idea a key is there. It is so real to the eye and touch. I recommend this rock to everyone r Rhone.

Reviews.Title: flat on bottom
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: picture makes it look like a rock all the way around - like two halves that fit together.  It's flat on the bottom with a white plastic piece that holds the key in place.  Top half looks like a rock, but you can't just place it in a rock pile to blend in.  Disappointing that picture was misleading.

Reviews.Title: Clever hiding place
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Angell "Issie"
Reviews.Content: A clever way to hide an extra key! The rock has a flat bottom so it works best to surround it with other "real" rocks from your landscaping. This helps it to blend in.

Reviews.Title: Like it, large enough to fit several keys but still looks fake
Reviews.Author: Debi Simon
Reviews.Content: I do like this, but it stands out like a "fake rock" so it don't hide it in plain sight.  Fits several keys.

Reviews.Title: This Rocks my Keys
Reviews.Author: Jared VanMeter
Reviews.Content: This key holder delivers as promised.  Looks just like a rock, when properly placed.  I would recommend putting it out of view as some people know to look for these types of key holders.  I also recommend putting your key in a small plastic bag as the rock isn't fully waterproof.  The best part about this buy is the price.

Reviews.Title: Key Holder
Reviews.Author: memecarol
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a rock key holder for so long and was beginning to think they did not make them anymore.  I am so glad I found it on Amazon.  I can find whatever I want on there.  A very happy customer

Reviews.Title: Great key holder
Reviews.Author: Coffee Lover
Reviews.Content: Have this hidden within my flower beds to provide security as I live alone and could lock myself out.  Knowing this is available hidden with a house key is great comfort.  Looks like a normal rock within the many others.  No one knows where it is but me and I doubt anyone could detect it is not real.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Thanks!
Reviews.Author: Rose Hackman
Reviews.Content: Arrived in time and in good condition.  It was a bit smaller than I realized, but I didn't look at the dimensions before I ordered.

Reviews.Title: it's half a rock with a flimsy plastic tray, not 2 halves as pictured
Reviews.Author: Clytemnestra G
Reviews.Content: I received this today (quick shipping, thanks!) and was disappointed to find that this product is only half of a fake rock, with a flimsy plastic tray (like throw away kid toy packaging quality of plastic) that loosely fits into the bottom. I have provided photos to help illustrate this.The display picture shows two halves, implying that the product is shaped like a (roundish) rock. A half rock would draw attention where I intend to use it. I did not want something that needed positioning such that it appears half-buried.In my opinion, this does not  resemble anything in nature found around here (New England), but it may pass for something vaguely volcanic.If you try to use this, your key would need to be in a plastic bag or else it could rust.I'm going to return this and buy a key holder made from an actual rock that I found on uncommon goods.

Reviews.Title: A simple loose-fitting key compartment that is hidden in a realistic appearing faux-rock.
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: A simple loose-fitting key compartment that is hidden in a realistic appearing faux-rock. Works well for our purposes and was a great value.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a spear key
Reviews.Author: joana joe daou
Reviews.Content: Looks great in front of my house hidden with the flowers where there is spear key.Looks like a real rock.... Excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Small but great
Reviews.Author: R. Leverett
Reviews.Content: I have just ordered 2 more for my relatives.The rock is smaller than I expected but looks so real.

Reviews.Title: Great Hide-a-Key
Reviews.Author: S. Charmian
Reviews.Content: Looks just like rock from the top.  I think the bottom plate could be a little better and maybe made with gray or black plastic instead of white, but on the ground it could fool just about anyone.

Reviews.Title: I need to pay more attention.
Reviews.Author: J. Lovett
Reviews.Content: This looks just like the photo.  I am giving it 4 stars because it does what it says it does.  If you look closer it can only hold 1 regular size key. If you have a key larger then the picture key, like a car key, it will not fit.  Also if you need to hide more then two normal skinny keys you need a bigger rock.  If you really want to save money, but your key in a zip lock bag and hide under a  rock.  I got to stay way from the TODAY'S DEAL PAGE.

Reviews.Title: Realisting and effective
Reviews.Author: R. Peacock
Reviews.Content: What I got in the mail is a very realistic looking half-rock, with a small plastic cover on the bottom.  The reviewers who got unconvincing rocks must have gotten them from a different seller, perhaps, because my rock looks and feels authentic.If fits 1 or 2 regular house keys just fine, though, like others, I recommend you wrap them in plastic first to keep out moisture.I hid this in my back yard, amongst a work area with lots of other rocks and debris, and feel very secure that no one would possibly stumble upon it, even if they were looking for a spare key.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Joyce in Kansas
Reviews.Content: I guess I didn't read the specs closely because when these came, they were much smaller than I was expecting.  A good wind could blow them away or a rainstorm could wash them away.  I was really expecting something a bit larger.

Reviews.Title: Great for decoration. But may be not for your keys!
Reviews.Author: kvam
Reviews.Content: I personally feel it is not a safe idea to store keys in that.Thieves now a days are very smart.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: James Edwards
Reviews.Content: The rock is realistic looking but the key holder fit loose under the rock. Over all it does the job for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Well thought out
Reviews.Author: Online Purchaser
Reviews.Content: These key rocks are perfect to place around the house for extra keys in case you ever lock yourself out. Keeps dirt and debris off the key so it does not rust/corrode out over time.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: zachd1125
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with this product. It has some great added weight to it, and blends in with almost any style of rock you may have,

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I love the material, is not heavy at all and I can camouflage it perfectly in my garden, the perfect emergency key hidden spot

Reviews.Title: Does the trick, but it doesn't look exactly like a rock...
Reviews.Author: DIYDanielle "DIYDanielle"
Reviews.Content: This should do the trick for my purposes, but I wouldn't say it looks exactly like a rock... there's just that look to it that might be easy to pick up if you're close enough. As such, I'd recommend not putting this somewhere really obvious.

Reviews.Title: Not great - but works.
Reviews.Author: Stefani
Reviews.Content: I have a house key hidden in this, but it's sort of "iffy".  The compartment for the key is small.  I use an Ilco key that is 2.5" long and it really doesn't fit inside.  I've got it in there, but the cover for the compartment is off kilter with the key in it and doesn't close well.  In addition, it's not as pictured.  The rock is one piece (I thought it was two pieces based on the photo) but I see that the photo is actually a picture of two hide-a-key rocks.  The bottom of the rock is actually the white piece of plastic.

Reviews.Title: Rock on, Rock-in, not locked out
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: This little stone is easy to toss under a bush or bury in the dirt and hide a key.  Recommend this product, but just don't sit it out as it may be recognizable as a key hider, but in the flower bed it will go unnoticed.

Reviews.Title: Well they guessed it was a rock
Reviews.Author: Sharli Schwing
Reviews.Content: I got this as "a lump of coal" for my brother and sister-in-laws for Christmas to put money inside to help them out for the gas they spent coming to see us and they guessed in was a fake rock. Took them a couple seconds to figure out how to open it though. Very practical to have one of these with a spare key just in case. Pretty heavy and I wouldn't say realistic but it would definitely wouldn't look suspicious by your door.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real!
Reviews.Author: Sonitron
Reviews.Content: The rock actually looks real.  I would recommend it for anyone looking to hide a key somewhere in their yard

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: I love this key holder / rock , expecelly when the kids loose their key or family members come over and noone is there.

Reviews.Title: not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: Richard ice
Reviews.Content: This was a little small but....... it does what its suppose to! hold a key. kind of made cheep! i would but again

Reviews.Title: Great hide!
Reviews.Author: Daelynn Knoll
Reviews.Content: My husband uses this for geo-caching and we also have one for our spare house key.  It looks pretty realistic if it's in similar surroundings.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Not item pictured
Reviews.Author: KAW
Reviews.Content: I did not get the item pictured. I got a cheaper looking version with a white plastic bottom that falls off if you shake it. It does not look like a real rock nor will it protect your key from the elements. I wrapped my key in bubble wrap to protect it then placed it inside.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: I WONDER?
Reviews.Content: Looks like a real rock. Now I won't be locked out when I forget my keys inside my house :D

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Content: Great product, true to size and the keep fits just perfectly inside, would recommend it to any one :D :)

Reviews.Title: Love it...
Reviews.Author: Karina
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I needed, it has the look of a rock and the key fits perfect in it...I will recommend you 100% this product.

Reviews.Title: it's fine
Reviews.Author: Beach Bum
Reviews.Content: Nothing special, it looks a little fake but when you hide it between the bushes and throw a little dirt over it, it will look more real. I have a standard key but I can imagine that a bigger size key will have trouble fitting inside the rock.

Reviews.Title: Nice pet rock!
Reviews.Author: G, Wayne
Reviews.Content: Not only does it look like a rock...but feels like a rock too! It can hold 2 house keys, but I would seek another type of hiding place for car keys. Don't think I will be locked out of house again any time soon!

Reviews.Title: was so good...
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: my landlord threw it out by mistake and I lost both my rock and my key :-/looks very real

Reviews.Title: it's a rock
Reviews.Author: Jason Cotter
Reviews.Content: Hid my key which is exactly what it's designed to do. Blends in fairly well and took the abuse of the weather so it is a good buy if you want a rock to your key in

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Brian W. Smith
Reviews.Content: Once you hide it and dirty it up, it looks just like a rock.  Great for a dead drop so you can feel secure if you lose your key.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for forgetful :)
Reviews.Author: L. Bolander
Reviews.Content: I got this as a funny gift for my sister-in-law, who kept on getting locked out of her house. I ordered one for myself too and this is great. The bottom insert part (where you hide the key) of the rock is white. It probably should be charcoal like the rest, but it is not a big deal for me at all. Much better than keeping the key under the mat :)

Reviews.Title: Stalwart 72-0263 Hide-A-Key Realistic Rock Outdoor Key Holder-As Seen on TV...
Reviews.Author: Becki grow
Reviews.Content: The Stalwart 72-0263 Hide-A-Key Realistic Rock Outdoor Key Holder-As Seen on TV... is just what is needed for a spare key.

Reviews.Title: exactly what we wanted. All of our other rocks just are rocks. Its nice to have one that has a key in it.
Reviews.Author: Shawn Bolz
Reviews.Content: Beware it doesn't come with your house key you have to put it in yourself but other then that its perfect.

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Mark Garner
Reviews.Content: Despite previous reviewers, I believe this hide a key is realistic enough to blend in to a natural environment.  The key is to place it out in the open.  Place it somewhere where it will blend in.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Edmonds
Reviews.Content: Relatively real looking if place with other rocks. Space for key is just a little small for my keys but can make it work.

Reviews.Title: Good ideal
Reviews.Author: Jasmin
Reviews.Content: Once I use it should be right on time this a great way to put up a key to keep from getting locked out

Reviews.Title: worked out great
Reviews.Author: Selena Tamayo
Reviews.Content: I thought the rock looked pretty realstic and our key fit perfect in it and our family members were able to retrieve it great. In fact they bought one shortly after from amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Great Key Holder.
Reviews.Author: David Craig
Reviews.Content: I had one like it but my wife, not knowing what it was, threw it away when she saw it in the sink. The old one was brown, and the color matched the rocks in my yard better than the darker new. one. This disappoints me, but they said that there is no guarantee that it would look as displayed advertisement. Anyway, I'll make do. Glad I bought the new one, but still wish I had the old one. BTW - I tape the bottom shut and leave the rock almost entirely buried, so having had to dig it up one day, I set it in the sink to wash then reuse. My wife being the clean fanatic thought best to toss it without asking. Oops!

Reviews.Title: It's a fake rock, what do you expect?
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Turns out, this is a fake rock that looks mostly like a rock as long as folks aren't looking too closely. I still wouldn't put it next to the door that the key fits, but then hey, I'm a bit more paranoid than most, maybe. It's fairly weather tight, and given that it's plastic, should last in the weather.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine.
Reviews.Author: LD
Reviews.Content: I have to laugh at the other reviews. I mean this is a fake rock key holder. It meets the description just fine. I don't have any issues with it getting wet inside.  I'm not sure what people were expecting from this... ;)

Reviews.Title: Decided not to use.
Reviews.Author: M. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I'm afraid this will get tossed in the woods and lost.  It is okay, but so far we aren't using it.

Reviews.Title: Basic but worth the price
Reviews.Author: Temposwing
Reviews.Content: Its size ( rather largish but with smallish key pocket)  means you will have to dig a bit deep to disguise, but it fills the bill.  Good idea to wrap the key in saran wrap or something to protect if from the elements.

Reviews.Title: Godsend
Reviews.Author: K. Manuel "KMan"
Reviews.Content: We have several teenagers and other assorted absent-minded people in our house (including me), so this little key hider is a Godsend.  It was very inexpensive and looks just like the other rocks behind our house.

Reviews.Title: KEEP THIS SEPARATE FROM OTHER ROCKS
Reviews.Author: MIKE EDWARDS
Reviews.Content: .....Because otherwise you'll lose it...it's that realistic.While it does have room for the pictured Qwikset house key don't expect to hide a digital electronic ignition key in these - the key compartment is too small for anything larger than a house key which is what I had wanted.

Reviews.Title: "semi realistic"
Reviews.Author: laura hicks
Reviews.Content: This product is cool in idea. Its a cheap way to hide a key. The only down side is that it feels real but doesn't not really look like a real rock. You can spot it immedietly.

Reviews.Title: looks and feels like a real rock!
Reviews.Author: Tamara Hall
Reviews.Content: Me and my fiance just bought a house and were looking for a good place to hide a spare key.  I found this on here and decided to give it a shot, since it was so inexpensive.  It looks and feels like a real rock and is an excellent place to hide a spare key!  We put it in the garden in the front of our house and you really would never know it has a key hidden in it.

Reviews.Title: Great camouflage!
Reviews.Author: Maria Arango Diener
Reviews.Content: Very roomy for a key or two on a ring, great camouflage, very realistic. The plastic bottom is easy to remove and replace and stays water and insect tight. I actually painted one to match our sandstone landscaping and it looks great. The other we use as it came, in gray. Great solution for either an outdoor structure key or an extra emergency house key.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: EE
Reviews.Content: Looks pretty good for a fake rock. Easy to use and looks real hid under a bush. Not that cheap looking.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: RPGJoe
Reviews.Content: Cool little product.  I use it in my RTBAV seminars.It does look like a rock, but you'll need more rocksaround it, otherwise, it'll look very out of place.

Reviews.Title: Not what it appears.
Reviews.Author: Ken S
Reviews.Content: Pro: I looks like a rock.Con: The compartment is only big enough to securely fit a mailbox key, the house key would not fit no matter how much I worked it.  I would not recommend this product unless you have a small key in mind.

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: Crypt13
Reviews.Content: Looks like a rock. Cant ask for anything more. We have it sitting out our house, it is not noticeable.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Those Who Tend to Accidentally Lock Themselves Out
Reviews.Author: asianamy
Reviews.Content: I have already had to make use of this key hider in the few days since receiving it.  I often have started my car in the cold winter mornings, only to remember I needed to grab something from inside my home.  I hated turning off my engine to unlock my front door, so now with the key hider I won't have to.  I have also gone out to my car, only to realize I failed to grab my keys from the hook inside my home because I had my hands full.  This has been the answer for me, and at such a small cost!!  Very realistic looking rock.  I'm sure I will be utilizing it many more times in the months to come!!

Reviews.Title: Cheapo China Product
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: It does the job, but it looks pretty cheaply made.  Doesn't really look like a rock too, but might be fine mixed with others.  I'll use it, but would have liked to go with another model.

Reviews.Title: XLNT!!!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Bubel
Reviews.Content: This fake rock is insurance in case we are without our door key.  We have it mixed up in a potted plant so we feel secure....

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Rammer jammer
Reviews.Content: I will only be using this for a house key. It will not fit a modern truck key but I bought it for the house not the truck. 5/5*s incredible

Reviews.Title: Looks like a rock, feels like a rock.. but.....
Reviews.Author: Charles Perez
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these from different Amazon sellers because they looked slightly different. Turns out they were exactly the same. Both quite convincing.These "rocks" blend right in to the yard and I had the opportunity to use one just 3 days after placing it in my yard. I'd certainly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: TrippingBilly
Reviews.Content: Bought this hide-a-key for geocaching to hide-a-cache in a pile of rocks. It works great and I've received some good feedback on my hide!

Reviews.Title: Looks real, feels real
Reviews.Author: Reviewer ":)"
Reviews.Content: I did not have the white plastic showing issue and this looks and feels like a real rock! no issues whatso ever! was a great cheap buy for me!

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Jenn L "truck driver"
Reviews.Content: This is awesome, I love it. You can put it in a garden and not even know it's not a real rock. The only thing I might change is the bottom, I am afraid of water getting in it, otherwise I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Doesn't quite look like a rock, plastic bottom is flimsy
Reviews.Author: Nancy Kim
Reviews.Content: This doesn't look like a real rock unless you're very far away. The white plastic bottom piece was very flimsy and I needed to bend it a few times before it would stay securely in the rock cavity. I had to remove my small keychain because it would not fit in the cavity - it will only hold a standard house key, no more. Overall, price was cheap so I can't complain too much, but I would not recommend or purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with this product
Reviews.Author: Carol Kay Moore
Reviews.Content: I have owned one of these for many years and recently bought two more  -  for a neighbor and a daughter-in-law.  It is very easy to blend in with other rocks or in vegetation.  With a little ingenuity, your  key will never be found and it sure beats keeping the key under a doormat.

Reviews.Title: just right
Reviews.Author: Baugher
Reviews.Content: Sometimes you just have to admit your parents are getting older! My mother called to tell me she had lock herself out of the house without her keys... the first thing I said was she needed a hide-a-key outside in the garden, so here it is. Thankfully when the rock arrived she laughed and then headed o the hardware store to get a key cut.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Sandy Sobke "Sandy Sobke"
Reviews.Content: hides well one two three four five six seven eight nine tan eleven twelve thirteen fourteen fifteen sixteen seventeen eighteen

Reviews.Title: Average Key Holder
Reviews.Author: ameck "ameck"
Reviews.Content: This is an average key holder.  It holds an average key.  We did try to bury it a little because it's not very heavy and we were afraid it could get kicked or blown easily.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Looks like a rock, unless you get really, really close to it. I put two keys in a small ziploc and stuffed it in there. Works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Okay Product
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Snyder
Reviews.Content: It does look like a rock but the white sleeve on the bottom side is too large and sticks out from the edge which gives it away as a hiding place.

Reviews.Title: It's a Rock
Reviews.Author: Terry Ball
Reviews.Content: Man, this thing looks like a real rock. We used to hide our spare key in a baby's shoe hidden behind a flower stand next to the front door. Now we use "The Rock". Slipped it into the raised flower bed next to the front door amongst other rocks and it fit right in.Only problem? In the dark you have to have a flashlight to tell it from all the other rocks. One of the best purchases I hve ever made under $1.

Reviews.Title: Not water tight
Reviews.Author: G. Smith "Mich Mom"
Reviews.Content: Looks real enough but is not water tight.  Key is rusted.  will have to get a new one and put it in plastic first.

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: tisme
Reviews.Content: After getting locked out of my house, I ordered this so I could have a hidden key.  It looks very much like a real rock and is serving it's purpose.

Reviews.Title: Don't get locked out again!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This hide a key blends in perfectly, no overly fake rockish.  Easy to open.  Can fit multiple keys if needed.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Looking for a Cheap Price
Reviews.Author: Shopper X
Reviews.Content: I got two of these things they were so cheap, one for myself and one as a joke gift. I remember when these rocks looked super fake, this one is more realistic than I would have anticipated but I am sure if someone were nosing around looking for a "suspicious" rock with a key inside this thing would stick out like a sore thumb. Then again, what's the point of that? Wouldn't someone just break a window or kick in a door and get it over with? Why spend more time messing around someone's house during the day looking for a suspected hidden key? I'm not in the robbery business so the details might be lost on me. Good option for accidental lock out or emergency entry. The items I received were a little more white on the raised surfaces than the one pictured. Realism probably depends on the color of rocks in your region or around your house. A point about the product I wanted to make was that the bottom does not have an attached door that rotates open to house the key and then swings back to cover it up again. This rock has a cover that fits around the inside of the cavity to hold it on and slides entirely out made of a pretty flimsy plastic. If you lose the cover, you're out of luck. Since that is the part that is on the ground, it doesn't need to be too advanced but I would have preferred something a little more secure.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't look like a rock.
Reviews.Author: A. Beauchene
Reviews.Content: It doesn't look like a rock so you might as well use the flowerpot or the door casement to hide your spare key.

Reviews.Title: Great way to hid a key!
Reviews.Author: V. Whitehill
Reviews.Content: This rock is a great way to hide a key. We have a landscaped front yard and placed this rock near a few other small rocks by the front door. While it does not look exactly like the other rocks, we partially buried the rock and it looks like it was always meant to be there. Recently, my friend needed to drop something off while we were not home. My friend was easily able to find the rock with our directions and get the key out.

Reviews.Title: Hide out
Reviews.Author: Charlotte
Reviews.Content: It fits right into the area where I don't want it to be noticeable.  I don't like that it do not snap close and it do need to be a little bit longer

Reviews.Title: Works great, looks real
Reviews.Author: Kirk Purser "kdig"
Reviews.Content: Simple enough item, and it looks and feels very real.  Nice deep compartment that should fit almost any standard front door key.  Blends in very nicely and keeps the key dry inside.  Just what i was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Just like a real rock....
Reviews.Author: Shawn D "s1283"
Reviews.Content: Almost realistic. Always odd to see a rock like this near a door anyways so you have to hide the rock too

Reviews.Title: Not what it looks like
Reviews.Author: Tica
Reviews.Content: I looks on the picture like it is like a whole rock but it is not the bottom is flat so you can definitely see that it is fake.

Reviews.Title: Trademark Tools 72-0263 Hide-A-Key Key holder
Reviews.Author: Nancy York
Reviews.Content: Needed something to put a key or two in for the house.  The only thing is it's not water proof.  The bottom doesn't fit real tight & I've noticed the key a little wet.  But it hidden.  And I like that.

Reviews.Title: I purchased this for geocaching
Reviews.Author: kc2pxp
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical because of the price of this product but I decided to purchase it anyway. I use this in a hobby called geocaching and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Doug Gwilliam "douggw"
Reviews.Content: This rocks looks and even feels very realistic.  I'm very happy with the price and quality of product.  I read many of the reviews and looks like each seller's product is a bit different. I bought from Rodgers Goods and was very happy. I even went back and bought another one of these to use in geocaching!

Reviews.Title: rockin' hide-a-key
Reviews.Author: A. Brine
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for! It blends into my rock garden without getting lost. Bought an extra one to give as a gift.

Reviews.Title: too small for my key
Reviews.Author: dmstok
Reviews.Content: It is a nice looking realistic product, but the opening is so small that my house key does not fit inside. Rather than returning it, I just put it out in the garden.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: it looks like the real deal perfect to keep a spear key for emergencys in your garden, just make sure to remember wher you place it becose you wont found it if you dont

Reviews.Title: Realistic!
Reviews.Author: Karen Brothers
Reviews.Content: A little thing, I know, but it looks very real and gives me peace of mind that I won' lock myself out of my house.  It was on sale at a very cheap price, but the shipping cost $5 - much more than the product!  ha-ha!

Reviews.Title: so real looking
Reviews.Author: marlene
Reviews.Content: i have seen other hide a key rocks & you could tell that they was fake. this rock looks & feels real. We have a rock garden & this rock is out in it, you cant tell which rock is fake not even by touch. it's really got the real rock down. it's not to heavy & not too light. it's just right.

Reviews.Title: Looks pretty realistic, but no protection from weather for the key
Reviews.Author: Lisa Kearns "Lisa Kearns"
Reviews.Content: My "rock" arrived today, and I'm a little disappointed in it.  It does look somewhat like a rock, enough that I can put it somewhere out in the front yard.  But unlike the photo, this isn't a two-sided rock with a compartment inside.  It's a half rock, flat on the bottom, and the white drawer/compartment fits inside the hole.  There is no protection against moisture getting on the key and making it rust or corrode.  There are also two pinholes in the top of the rock material that I can see light shining through, which will also allow rain in.The white key compartment is larger on one side than the rock, so it shows when the rock is placed on the ground.  I'm going to seal the pinholes with some glue, and clip off the protruding edge of the white part, and also wrap my key in some plastic wrap or a snack sized ziplock bag.Cheaply made in China, this is another reminder to me that "As Seen On TV" means "junk".  Not a total waste of money, but not as good as it sounded.I posted two photos, to show the size of the rock and the key compartment.

Reviews.Title: Hide-a-Key
Reviews.Author: steyoso
Reviews.Content: Very Good Business, I did not have one single problem with them at all, excellent service!! I would recommend them to all.

Reviews.Title: Nifty Item! Saves you $60 a pop for locksmith!
Reviews.Author: SN
Reviews.Content: As a forgetful person I constantly get locked out of cars, homes, and office.In order to ameliorate this problem I bought this rock to hide my keys.PRO: Saves you lots of time and money from calling in a locksmithCON: water or bugs may get in, but is it worth to save $60 from a locksmith?If you forget to put the key back you're locked out again (which happened to me),which is why I'm ordering another rock BUT a different design.Don't want nosy people to wonder why we have 2 exact identical rocks!

Reviews.Title: Recieved quckly, but not the best quality. . . . . C-
Reviews.Author: William C. Barkdull
Reviews.Content: Recieved quckly, but not the best quality. . . . . C- maybe ok as marked and that is being kind! Is what it is and the cost wasn't much, the shipping cost more. Would not buy again knowing what it is now, but again for the money I am not out that much.

Reviews.Title: Rock outdoor key
Reviews.Author: Marjie Miller
Reviews.Content: I put it to use right away.  It's exactly what I needed.  I won't get locked out again.

Reviews.Title: realistic
Reviews.Author: Paul Parent
Reviews.Content: so realistic that when I received it, a friend of mine asked what I was doing with a rock on my kitchen table...

Reviews.Title: Even more realistic than previous models
Reviews.Author: Amy PS
Reviews.Content: This one's even better than our old one that was a casualty of a home-improvement project. Kinda pricey for what it is when you add shipping, but you just don't find these everywhere.

Reviews.Title: good safety item
Reviews.Author: HILLGATOR
Reviews.Content: THE ARTIFICIAL ROCKS ARE A GOOD SAFETY AND CONVENIENCE ITEM WHICH WE HAVE GIVEN TO ALL 4 OF OUR CHILDREN. EVEN THOSE WITH A GARAGE DOOR OPENER CAN USE THESE AS THEY WOULD BE NEEDED IF ONE RETURNED HOME DURING A POWER FAILURE.

Reviews.Title: Rock
Reviews.Author: jboy
Reviews.Content: Well, it looks like a rock alright, the compartment for the key is firm. The delivery and execution was all I could ask for.

Reviews.Title: Default image is misleading
Reviews.Author: Kagedws6
Reviews.Content: My wife ordered this product to use a a geocache.  from the default photo it looks like the rock is a whole rock where one side slides to expose the hidden center.  in reality its half a rock with a cheep plastic clip that holds whatever you put in it but the clip itself falls out easily.

Reviews.Title: OK for the price
Reviews.Author: Carol E. Kokesh
Reviews.Content: This little rock is realistic looking.  But, the compartment for the hidden key is a bit difficult when your hands are cold and wet.  OK for the price.

Reviews.Title: looks like a rock
Reviews.Author: tbags
Reviews.Content: This product does look like a rock if it doesn't get turned over by the dog or whatever. Since the bad guys all know we are now hideing keys in rock lookalikes I bought this only for a key to a place I really don't care too much if someone gets into. The product is all that it was advertised though and I am happy with it for what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: An oldie but goodie
Reviews.Author: Travel Lover
Reviews.Content: These have been around a while, but for a good reason. I like the idea that I can't lock myself out, especially the more forgetful I become!I did trim the white plastic underside containing the key a bit to make it less obviously a safe. I also used a black marker to make it blend totally. Other reviewers were disturbed that the white plastic could be set into the resin rock a bit "off," so you could see it a little. Cutting it with a scissor is really no big deal and it works perfectly. Very easily blended into a flower pot or garden. Just make sure to put it in a place that a gardener wouldn't think to toss it as a stray rock.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Frances R. Dickman "Duchess of Westbury"
Reviews.Content: This doesn't really look like a rock at all.  The idea is a good one that is why I gave it two stars but it needs more work.

Reviews.Title: Rock Review
Reviews.Author: Heike
Reviews.Content: The idea of being able to hide a key in the rock is great. I've bought it for other people, however this product arrived broken in the mail. The edges were broken into little pieces. I glued them back on because the price + shipping for this product wouldn't be worth it shipping back and going through all this trouble. Whoever wrapped it didn't do a good job.

Reviews.Title: smaller in person
Reviews.Author: S.Amicucci
Reviews.Content: This is a cool idea but you would think the rock would be the size of your hand.No. More like half the size of your palm. Its just enough room to fit a key or too. The outside is real looking from a distance but once you get closer to it, you will see how it does not really look real. The white plastic piece on the bottom shows a little from the bottom when the rock is on the ground.Overall its a great little thing to have when you want to keep a key around but you might want to make sure no one will inspect it and notice its a fake. I would recommend this to a friend if they are looking for something like this.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Just shop
Reviews.Content: Ideal for other reason, repeat do not use to store your keys outdoor or otherwise, with today counter survelliance gees for example are you aware of device which can scan your garbage locating metals, used by local metal pickers,, also used for robbery purposes in garages, homes etc done so by simply walking by building- so be aware-metal keys, outdoors-not a good idea, absolutely not, GOD BLESS! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

Reviews.Title: camouflage too good
Reviews.Author: barry oneill
Reviews.Content: This damn thing is hiding my key from me. Betsy's at the market picking up some more ivory flake soap and I'm locked out of the house!I put the hide a key outside but now all I see is rocks, who came up with this hair-brained idea anyway? This thing has better camouflage than the Vietcong!.I'm missing golden girls right now, I bet it's the episode where they finally have a foursome and I'm missing it goddammit.Where the hell is my damn key?!?!

Reviews.Title: Tricky picture, but still works well.
Reviews.Author: C. Gardner "SgtCheeseNOLS"
Reviews.Content: The picture is fairly deceptive. I was expecting a rock that broke in half and had the key hidden underneath. Instead of it half a rock with a plastick door on the bottom to place the key. But it still works. I was able to hide it in my garden, spray some dirt on top, and it hid very well. I asked my wife and friend to look for the key/rock and they couldn't find it...so I can't imagine a stranger having no knowledge of it seeing it.I gave it 4 out of 5 because of the photo, but the product still works well and was cheap.

Reviews.Title: not rocky enough
Reviews.Author: dave "mr. amazon"
Reviews.Content: i bought one of these cause i keep getting locked out of my apt.fits a key inside and probably more, even though i cant think of anything else to put inside it though.anyway, i have a rocky entrance to my building so i thought this would be perfect and solve my problem, but it stands out next to the real rocks.maybe its because i know what it is, but i dont feel comfortable enough to use it and leave the key to my apt in this rock.instead, i just have people asking me why im using a rock as a paperweight. at least i found some use in it.

Reviews.Title: had to buy a second one
Reviews.Author: DanielaB
Reviews.Content: After receiving this rock, i loved it so much, I bought a second one for a relative. Was it useful? Oh, yes! Many times !!! It really looks natural and like it belongs where is was placed! The price is great and the delivery was fast!

Reviews.Title: Realistic rock for higing keys
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: I am Very pleased with the natural look of this rock and I would reccomend to to anyone it also fits two fitd two or more keys!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Functions well as an "actual" rock.
Reviews.Author: Wednesdayschild
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with this product. I recently needed a rock when I found out that my boyfriend was sleeping with one of the secretaries at his office. My (now ex) boyfriend also drove a really nice sports car, on which he did not quite have enough insurance coverage. Since until recently he received his mail at my house, I was well aware of this.  I discovered his infidelity while doing laundry one day. I noticed that his shirt smelled suspiciously of Chanel, which I do not wear. In the pocket of his slacks, I found a note from "Sharon," thanking him for a wonderful lunch hour and bragging about how he put a run in her stockings, which she had difficulty removing because she was so cramped from the lack of space in his back seat "te he he".  Infuriated, I did not have time to procure a real rock. I grabbed the "hide a key" rock, and got into my car to drive over there. I saw his car; red, recently waxed, and otherwise gorgeous.  I had no trouble smashing all the windows in at all. It didn't even dent the Hide A Key! As a matter of fact, the impact caused the key (which was his) to fly out at one point during the vandalism, and it conveniently slipped into a storm drain. Since he can no longer enter the house, I decided to throw all his belongings on the lawn. Thanks Hide A Key!

Reviews.Title: junky, butt does the job
Reviews.Author: William Rollins
Reviews.Content: top notch...ya gotta appreciate this one...does all that you can hope for...just the way i'd build one, only alot worse

ProductInfo.Features:
Realistic looking rock
Discrete way to hide your spare key
Measures 2.25 by 3.5 by 1.5-Inch
ProductInfo.Name: Stalwart 72-0263 Hide-A-Key Realistic Rock Outdoor Key Holder-As Seen on TV
